author: dkulp
msg: Make sure the Tokens (X509Token, IssuedToken, etc...) can participate in interceptor selection
Add the AppliesTo element to the RequestSecurityToken message when possible
Add IssuedToken interceptors to handle the configuration and retrieval of Trust tokens.   No client side coding now required.  Just config.
